messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] shogun miniseriers
messages.msgSnippet: I would be very interested in any/all of the serious but I am concerned of the quality of the movie. Also if given a good deal i would definitely give  you a
messages.messageBody:
I would be very interested in any/all of the serious but I am concerned of
the quality of the movie.

Also if given a good deal i would definitely give you a shot in purchasing
movies from you.

Please let me know if and when you receive any.

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] shogun miniseriers
messages.msgSnippet: No promises on this, but I do a lot of movie related projects with the computer. I typically get my hands on a lot of hard to get material. I MIGHT be able
messages.messageBody:
No promises on this, but I do a lot of movie related projects with the
computer. I typically get my hands on a lot of "hard to get" material. I
MIGHT be able to get the Shogun series.
In addition, I have a DVD burner and a great deal of authoring software.
If/when I get the Shogun material, I could potentially make DVDs out of it
if anyone is interested.
I'll start looking around and keep you posted.

Alex

----- Original Message -----
From: "dave.b2" <dave.b2@...>
To: <samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, December 24, 2002 5:18 AM
Subject: Re: [samuraihistory] shogun miniseriers

INTERESTED IN,by the way im in australia let me know if its what you want
dave

extra.

thanks

messages.subject: shogun miniseriers
messages.msgSnippet: does anyone have an original or copy of the entire shogun miniseries? id really like to see it and dont really wanna dish out $200+ for it. if anyone could
messages.messageBody:
does anyone have an original or copy of the entire shogun miniseries? id
really like to see it and dont really wanna dish out $200+ for it. if anyone
could possibly make a dub for me, i would pay for all costs and throw in some
extra.

thanks
